definition: To convey or transmit information, messages, or data from one person or place to another, typically through various means of communication. It is commonly used in the context of sending or delivering information, whether it be through verbal, written, or electronic means.

examples.german: Ich werde dir die Informationen übermitteln.
examples.english: I will transmit the information to you.

examples.german: Bitte übermitteln Sie uns Ihre Kontaktdaten.
examples.english: Please provide us with your contact information.

examples.german: Er konnte seine Gedanken nicht richtig übermitteln.
examples.english: He couldn't convey his thoughts properly.
